greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A161340.
formula: a(n) = A160429(n) for n>1 and n not a power of 2.
a(n) = A160429(n) - 3n*(3n - 1) for n>1 and n a power of 2.
example: Written as an irregular triangle in which row lengths give A011782 the sequence begins:
program: a(n) = if (n==1, 1, if (ispow2(n), f(n) - 3*n*(3*n - 1), f(n))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 15 2020
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jun 14 2009
ext: Formula and more terms from _Nathaniel Johnston_, Nov 15 2010
